text: @CoedYGo @DefraGovUK It is absolutely abhorrent the lack of ability that the @EnvAgency has to enforce ANY legislation that exists already. The River Wye is dying and we are forced to report our neighbour multiple times a day for breaches over the past 3+ years and nothing has changed.

Agree,too little too late,the residents living close to the site have been complaining for two gears yet the smell has worsened-it’s clear that @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency have not listened or cared until this point. They deserve better - where’s the humanity @StinkStopthe ?! https://t.co/DAknYAkj7E

text: @Feargal_Sharkey @Chilternstreams @EnvAgency That's not entirely fair - our rivers have always been fair game for abuse.
